QuestData.Title: An Old Friend
QuestData.Description: Since the beginning, a shaman has been called to serve the Throne of Elements as its keeper. It is a lifelong calling and a new keeper is only called after the last has passed on.$b$bGar'rok has been our loyal keeper for many years, cleansing the Elemental Plateau during countless cycles of rebirth.$b$bOur keeper is dying, and soon another will be called in his place. When he passes, he should not be alone. Go to him, $n.$b$bEase his pain.
QuestData.RewardText: Kalandrios sent you to me? I am honored.$b$bThe furies are wise, they know the burdens of my heart.$b$bYou may not know, but you have been sent to grant a last request to a dying shaman.$b$bFor this, I am grateful.
